```{r}
library(glue)
library(odbc)
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(pool)

date_1 <- "2021-01-01"
date_2 <- Sys.Date() %m+% months(6)

#MApping for V_AVAILABILITY
slot_mapping_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AMBULATORY_SLOT_MAPPING")
slot_mapping <- glue("CREATE TABLE AMBULATORY_SLOT_MAPPING AS 
                     SELECT DISTINCT DEP_RPT_GRP_SEVENTEEN  AS CAMPUS, DEPT_SPECIALTY_NAME AS CAMPUS_SPECIALTY, DEPARTMENT_ID, 
                     DEPARTMENT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT, NPI, VISIT_PROV_STAFF_RESOURCE_C, PROV_ID FROM MV_DM_PATIENT_ACCESS")

###Creating joined v_availability and block tables
avail_block_without_collapse_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")
avail_block_without_collapse_query <- glue("CREATE TABLE AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE AS
SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROV_ID, PROV_NM_WID, SLOT_DATE, SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, SLOT_LENGTH, UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C, 
TIME_HELD_YN, APPT_NUMBER, PAT_ENC_CSN_ID, PRIVATE_YN, ORG_OVBK_OPENINGS, ORG_REG_OPENINGS,
CASE 
WHEN ORG_BLOCK_NAME = 'NO BLOCK' THEN BLOCK_NAME
ELSE ORG_BLOCK_NAME
END AS COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT av.DEPARTMENT_ID, av.DEPARTMENT_NAME, av.PROV_ID ,av.PROV_NM_WID, av.SLOT_DATE, 
av.SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, av.SLOT_LENGTH, av.UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C, av.TIME_HELD_YN, av.APPT_NUMBER, 
av.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID, av.PRIVATE_YN, av.ORG_OVBK_OPENINGS, av.ORG_REG_OPENINGS,
COALESCE(zb1.NAME, 'NO BLOCK') AS BLOCK_NAME, 
COALESCE(zb2.NAME, 'NO BLOCK') AS ORG_BLOCK_NAME
FROM V_AVAILABILITY av
LEFT JOIN AVAIL_BLOCK ab ON av.DEPARTMENT_ID = ab.DEPARTMENT_ID 
    AND av.PROV_ID = ab.PROV_ID 
    AND av.SLOT_BEGIN_TIME = ab.SLOT_BEGIN_TIME
LEFT JOIN ZC_APPT_BLOCK zb1 ON ab.BLOCK_C = zb1.APPT_BLOCK_C
LEFT JOIN ZC_APPT_BLOCK zb2 ON ab.REL_BLOCK_C = zb2.APPT_BLOCK_C
WHERE av.SLOT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
    AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
;")

avail_block_without_collapse_index <- glue("CREATE INDEX avail_block_without_collapse_index on AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE (SLOT_DATE, DEPARTMENT_ID)")

avail_block_grouped_without_collapse_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_GROUPED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")
avail_block_grouped_without_collapse_query <- glue("CREATE TABLE AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_GROUPED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE AS
                                  SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROV_ID, PROV_NM_WID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, TO_CHAR(SLOT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm') AS SLOT_MONTH_YEAR
                                  FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                                  GROUP BY DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROV_ID, PROV_NM_WID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, TO_CHAR(SLOT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm');
                                  ")

avail_block_grouped_without_collapse_index <- glue("CREATE INDEX avail_block_grouped_without_collapse_index on AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_GROUPED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE (SLOT_DATE, DEPARTMENT_ID)")


### Only return relevant rows from access table and return distinct rows
raw_access_without_collapse_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AMBULATORY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")
raw_access_without_collapse_query <- glue("CREATE TABLE AMBULATORY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE AS 
SELECT d.* FROM(
    SELECT c.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, APPT_DTTM, MRN ORDER BY DEPARTMENT_ID, 
    PROV_ID, APPT_DTTM, MRN, APPT_MADE_DTTM DESC) AS ROW_ID 
        FROM (
            Select a.* , b.SLOT_DATE, b.SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, b.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME FROM(
                (SELECT * FROM( 
                  SELECT PAT_ENC_CSN_ID, SITE AS CAMPUS, DEPARTMENT_NAME, 
                   DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_NAME_WID, PROV_ID, DEPT_SPECIALTY_NAME, NPI, VISIT_PROV_STAFF_RESOURCE_C,
                    DERIVED_STATUS_DESC AS APPT_STATUS, APPT_DTTM, MRN,
                    TRUNC(APPT_DTTM) AS APPT_DATE, APPT_BLOCK_C AS SCHED_BLOCK_C, APPT_BLOCK_NAME AS SCHED_BLOCK_NAME,
                     TO_CHAR(APPT_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm') AS APPT_MONTH_YEAR,
                     (APPT_LENGTH) AS APPT_LENGTH_MINS, OVERBOOKED_YN, APPT_MADE_DTTM, APPT_CANC_DTTM
                     FROM MV_DM_PATIENT_ACCESS 
                     WHERE APPT_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
                        AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) a
                INNER JOIN
                (SELECT * FROM( 
                SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME FROM( 
                  SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT_NAME, DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_NM_WID, PROV_ID,
                   SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, SLOT_DATE, TO_CHAR(SLOT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm') AS SLOT_MONTH_YEAR, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SLOT_LENGTH
                    FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE 
                     WHERE UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C IS NULL AND SLOT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
                        AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')))) b
            ON a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID AND a.PROV_ID = b.PROV_ID 
                AND a.APPT_DTTM = b.SLOT_BEGIN_TIME
                AND a.SCHED_BLOCK_NAME = b.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
            ) ORDER BY a.APPT_MADE_DTTM DESC
    ) c
)d WHERE d.ROW_ID = 1;")


raw_access_without_collapse_index <- glue("CREATE index raw_access_without_collapse_index on AMBULATORY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE (APPT_DATE, DEPARTMENT_ID, CAMPUS)")



### Create queries for summing scheduled and arrived hours
access_sched_arived_hour_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AMBULATORY_SCHED_ARRIVED_HOURS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")
access_sched_arived_hour_query <- glue("CREATE TABLE AMBULATORY_SCHED_ARRIVED_HOURS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE AS 
                           SELECT a.CAMPUS, a.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.DEPARTMENT_NAME, a.PROV_ID, a.PROV_NAME_WID, a.DEPT_SPECIALTY_NAME, 
                           a.APPT_DATE, a.NPI, a.VISIT_PROV_STAFF_RESOURCE_C, a.SCHED_BLOCK_NAME, a.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME,
                           sum(a.APPT_LENGTH_MINS) AS SCHEDULED_MINS, sum(b.APPT_LENGTH_MINS) AS ARRIVED_MINS
                           FROM 
                           ((SELECT * FROM AMBULATORY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                            WHERE (APPT_STATUS IN ('Arrived', 'No Show','Scheduled')) OR
                           (APPT_STATUS IN  ('Canceled', 'Rescheduled', 'Bumped') AND 
                            TO_CHAR(APPT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(APPT_CANC_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) a
                            LEFT JOIN
                           (SELECT * FROM AMBULATORY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                            WHERE APPT_STATUS = 'Arrived') b
                            ON a.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID = b.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID)
                            GROUP BY a.CAMPUS, a.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.DEPARTMENT_NAME, a.PROV_ID, a.PROV_NAME_WID, a.DEPT_SPECIALTY_NAME, 
                            a.APPT_DATE, a.NPI, a.VISIT_PROV_STAFF_RESOURCE_C, a.SCHED_BLOCK_NAME, a.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME;
                           ")


access_sched_arived_hour_index <- glue("CREATE index access_sched_arived_hour_index on AMBULATORY_SCHED_ARRIVED_HOURS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE (APPT_DATE, DEPARTMENT_ID, CAMPUS)")


availability_without_collapse_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AMBULATORY_AVAILABILITY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")
availability_without_collapse_query<- glue("CREATE TABLE AMBULATORY_AVAILABILITY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE AS
                           SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROV_NM_WID, PROV_ID,
                           SLOT_DATE, TO_CHAR(SLOT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm') AS SLOT_MONTH_YEAR, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, 
                           SUM(SLOT_LENGTH) AS AVAILABLE_MINS
                           FROM
                           (SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROV_NM_WID, PROV_ID,
                           SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, SLOT_DATE, TO_CHAR(SLOT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm') AS SLOT_MONTH_YEAR, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SLOT_LENGTH
                           FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                           WHERE UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C IS NULL
                           AND SLOT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
                           AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
                           GROUP BY DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROV_NM_WID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, SLOT_MONTH_YEAR, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME;")


availability_without_collapse_index <- glue("CREATE index availability_without_collapse_index on AMBULATORY_AVAILABILITY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE (SLOT_DATE, DEPARTMENT_ID)")

#table for calculating overbook_mins_v2
overbook_raw_without_collapse_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AMBULATORY_OVERBOOK_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")
overbook_raw_without_collapse_query <- glue("CREATE TABLE AMBULATORY_OVERBOOK_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE AS
 SELECT c.DEPARTMENT_ID, c.PROV_ID, c.SLOT_DATE, c.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, sum(c.SLOT_LENGTH) AS OVERBOOKED_MINS_V2
                       FROM
                       (SELECT a.*, b.APPT_NUMBER, b.SLOT_LENGTH
                         FROM(
                           (SELECT * FROM AMBULATORY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                            WHERE (APPT_STATUS IN ('Arrived', 'No Show','Scheduled')) OR
                            (APPT_STATUS IN  ('Canceled', 'Rescheduled', 'Bumped') AND 
                              TO_CHAR(APPT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(APPT_CANC_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) a
                           LEFT JOIN
                           (SELECT PAT_ENC_CSN_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, PROV_NM_WID, PROV_ID,
                             SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, SLOT_DATE, SLOT_LENGTH, APPT_NUMBER, UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                             FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                             WHERE UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C IS NULL) b
                           ON a.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID = b.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID 
                           AND a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID
                           AND a.APPT_DTTM = b.SLOT_BEGIN_TIME)
                          WHERE APPT_NUMBER IN (2, 3))c
                          GROUP BY c.DEPARTMENT_ID, c.PROV_ID, c.SLOT_DATE, c.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME;")

overbook_raw_without_collapse_index <- glue("CREATE index overbook_raw_without_collapse_index on AMBULATORY_OVERBOOK_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE (SLOT_DATE, DEPARTMENT_ID)")


### Combine all final tables and map the campus column
slot_table_without_collapse_drop <- glue("DROP TABLE AMBULATORY_SLOT_BLOCK_DETAIL_TABLE")
slot_table_without_collapse_query <- glue("CREATE TABLE AMBULATORY_SLOT_BLOCK_DETAIL_TABLE AS
                            SELECT f.*, g.holiday, 
                            h.UNAVAILABLE_MINS, i.HELD_MINS, 
                            j.PRIVATE_MINS, k.OVERBOOKED_MINS, l.OVERBOOKED_MINS_V2
                            FROM
                            (
                              SELECT e.CAMPUS, e.DEPARTMENT_ID, e.DEPARTMENT, e.CAMPUS_SPECIALTY, e.NPI,  
                              e.VISIT_PROV_STAFF_RESOURCE_C, 
                              c.PROV_ID, TRIM(TRAILING FROM REGEXP_REPLACE(PROV_NM_WID, '\\[(.*?)\\]', '')) AS Provider, 
                              c.SLOT_DATE, c.SLOT_MONTH_YEAR, c.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, c.SCHED_BLOCK_NAME, 
                              c.SLOT_DATE - (TO_CHAR(c.SLOT_DATE, 'D') - 1) AS APPT_WEEK, 
                              c.AVAILABLE_MINS, c.SCHEDULED_MINS, c.ARRIVED_MINS, TO_CHAR(c.SLOT_DATE, 'DY') AS APPT_DAY 
                              FROM 
                               ( SELECT n.* , b.SCHEDULED_MINS, b.ARRIVED_MINS, b.SCHED_BLOCK_NAME
                                FROM
                                (SELECT m.*, a.AVAILABLE_MINS
                                 FROM
                                (
                                  SELECT * FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_GROUPED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                                ) m
                                LEFT JOIN
                                (
                                  SELECT * FROM AMBULATORY_AVAILABILITY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                                ) a
                                ON m.DEPARTMENT_ID = a.DEPARTMENT_ID AND m.PROV_ID = a.PROV_ID AND m.SLOT_DATE = a.SLOT_DATE
                                AND m.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME = a.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                               ) n
                                LEFT JOIN
                                (
                                  SELECT * FROM AMBULATORY_SCHED_ARRIVED_HOURS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                                ) b
                                ON n.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME = b.SCHED_BLOCK_NAME
                                AND n.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID
                                AND n.SLOT_DATE = b.APPT_DATE AND n.PROV_ID = b.PROV_ID
                              ) c
                              LEFT JOIN
                              (
                                SELECT DISTINCT CAMPUS, CAMPUS_SPECIALTY, DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT, NPI, VISIT_PROV_STAFF_RESOURCE_C, PROV_ID
                                FROM AMBULATORY_SLOT_MAPPING
                              ) e 
                              ON c.DEPARTMENT_ID = e.DEPARTMENT_ID AND c.PROV_ID = e.PROV_ID
                            ) f
                            LEFT JOIN
                            villea04.holidays g ON f.SLOT_DATE = g.dates
                            LEFT JOIN
                            (
                              SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SUM(SLOT_LENGTH) AS UNAVAILABLE_MINS
                              FROM(
                              SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SLOT_LENGTH
                              FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE 
                              WHERE UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C IS NOT NULL 
                              AND SLOT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') 
                              AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
                              GROUP BY DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            ) h
                            ON f.DEPARTMENT_ID = h.DEPARTMENT_ID AND f.PROV_ID = h.PROV_ID AND f.SLOT_DATE = h.SLOT_DATE
                               AND f.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME = h.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            LEFT JOIN
                            (
                              SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SUM(SLOT_LENGTH) AS HELD_MINS
                              FROM(
                              SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SLOT_LENGTH
                              FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE 
                              WHERE UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C IS NULL 
                              AND TIME_HELD_YN = 'Y'
                              AND SLOT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') 
                              AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
                              GROUP BY DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            ) i
                            ON f.DEPARTMENT_ID = i.DEPARTMENT_ID AND f.PROV_ID = i.PROV_ID AND f.SLOT_DATE = i.SLOT_DATE 
                               AND f.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME = i.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            LEFT JOIN
                            (
                              SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SUM(SLOT_LENGTH) AS PRIVATE_MINS
                              FROM(
                              SELECT DISTINCT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, SLOT_BEGIN_TIME, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, SLOT_LENGTH
                              FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE 
                              WHERE UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C IS NULL 
                              AND PRIVATE_YN = 'Y'
                              AND SLOT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') 
                              AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
                              GROUP BY DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            ) j
                            ON f.DEPARTMENT_ID = j.DEPARTMENT_ID AND f.PROV_ID = j.PROV_ID AND f.SLOT_DATE = j.SLOT_DATE
                               AND f.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME = j.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            LEFT JOIN
                            (
                              SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME,
                              SUM(SLOT_LENGTH) AS OVERBOOKED_MINS
                              FROM AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE 
                              WHERE UNAVAILABLE_RSN_C IS NULL 
                              AND ORG_OVBK_OPENINGS > 0
                              AND SLOT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('{date_1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') 
                              AND TO_DATE('{date_2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
                              GROUP BY DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            ) k
                            ON f.DEPARTMENT_ID = k.DEPARTMENT_ID AND f.PROV_ID = k.PROV_ID AND f.SLOT_DATE = k.SLOT_DATE
                               AND f.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME = k.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            LEFT JOIN
                            (
                            SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, PROV_ID, SLOT_DATE, COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME, OVERBOOKED_MINS_V2
                            FROM AMBULATORY_OVERBOOK_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE
                            )l
                            ON f.DEPARTMENT_ID = l.DEPARTMENT_ID AND f.PROV_ID = l.PROV_ID AND f.SLOT_DATE = l.SLOT_DATE
                               AND f.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME = l.COMBINED_BLOCK_NAME
                            ")

slot_table_without_collapse_index <- glue("CREATE index slot_table_without_collapse_index on AMBULATORY_SLOT_BLOCK_DETAIL_TABLE (SLOT_DATE, DEPARTMENT_ID, CAMPUS)")


## Grouped Table execution
tryCatch({
  poolcon_upt <- dbConnect(drv = odbc(), "OAO Cloud DB Staging", timeout = 30)
  dbBegin(poolcon_upt)
  if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AMBULATORY_SLOT_MAPPING")){
      dbExecute(poolcon_upt, slot_mapping_drop) 
      }
      dbExecute(poolcon_upt, slot_mapping)
   if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_COMBINED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")){
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, avail_block_without_collapse_drop) 
      }
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, avail_block_without_collapse_query) 
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, avail_block_without_collapse_index)
   if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AVAILABILITY_BLOCK_GROUPED_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")){
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, avail_block_grouped_without_collapse_drop) 
      }
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, avail_block_grouped_without_collapse_query) 
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, avail_block_grouped_without_collapse_index)
   if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AMBULATORY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")){
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, raw_access_without_collapse_drop) 
      }
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, raw_access_without_collapse_query) 
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, raw_access_without_collapse_index)
   if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AMBULATORY_SCHED_ARRIVED_HOURS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")){
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, access_sched_arived_hour_drop) 
      }
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, access_sched_arived_hour_query) 
    dbExecute(poolcon_upt, access_sched_arived_hour_index)
   if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AMBULATORY_AVAILABILITY_ACCESS_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")){
     dbExecute(poolcon_upt, availability_without_collapse_drop) 
   }
   dbExecute(poolcon_upt, availability_without_collapse_query) 
   dbExecute(poolcon_upt, availability_without_collapse_index)
   if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AMBULATORY_OVERBOOK_WITHOUT_COLLAPSE")){
     dbExecute(poolcon_upt, overbook_raw_without_collapse_drop) 
   }
   dbExecute(poolcon_upt, overbook_raw_without_collapse_query) 
   dbExecute(poolcon_upt, overbook_raw_without_collapse_index)
 
   if(dbExistsTable(poolcon_upt, "AMBULATORY_SLOT_BLOCK_DETAIL_TABLE")){
     dbExecute(poolcon_upt, slot_table_without_collapse_drop) 
   }
   dbExecute(poolcon_upt, slot_table_without_collapse_query) 
   dbExecute(poolcon_upt, slot_table_without_collapse_index)
  
  
  dbCommit(poolcon_upt)
  dbDisconnect(poolcon_upt)
  print("success")
  
},
error = function(err){
  print(paste("Error staging:", err$message))
  dbRollback(poolcon_upt)
  dbDisconnect(poolcon_upt)
})

```
